QuestData.Title: REUSE ME - SCS
QuestData.Description: You'll need a vessel to hold the anima you need to collect, but one that will also allow you to channel said anima.$b$bThere was once such a device ages ago, but as of late they've become much more rare.$b$bIn my travels through the Maw, I have seen one once. It is in the (AREA NAME), held by (CREATURE).$b$bYou'll need luck on your side in order to retrieve it.
